sources.title: Call of the Forest
sources.description: Title: Call of the Forest Summary: Bob Brand is looking for a lost gold mine. Storm Cloud makes friends with Bob's son Bobby and to repay Bob for the help he gave the Indians, he gives a map locating the mine to the boy. But... Directed by: John F. Link Sr. Actors: Production Company: Edward F. Finney Productions Release Date: 18 November 1949 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Bob Brand is looking for a lost gold mine. Storm Cloud makes friends with Bob's son Bobby and to repay Bob for the help he gave the Indians, he gives a map locating the mine to the boy. But Sam Harrison is also after the mine and when he learns that Bob has the map he sets out to get it.

sources.title: Call of the Forest (1949) ROBERT LOWERY
sources.description:
Stars: Robert Lowery, Ken Curtis, Chief Thundercloud 
 Director: John F. Link Sr.

 Bob Brand is looking for a lost gold mine. Storm Cloud makes friends with Bob's son Bobby and to repay Bob for the help he gave the Indians, he gives a map locating the mine to the boy. But Sam Harrison is also after the mine and when he learns that Bob has the map he sets out to get it.

metadata.Plot: Bob Brand is looking for a lost gold mine. Storm Cloud makes friends with Bob's son Bobby and to repay Bob for the help he gave the Indians, he gives a map locating the mine to the boy. But Sam Harrison is also after the mine and when he learns that Bob has the map he sets out to get it.
metadata.Actors: Robert Lowery, Ken Curtis, Chief Thundercloud
